Parser¶

class parser.RogotoParser¶

Parse Rogoto Commands

clear()¶

Clears the code that will be executed

parse(commands)¶

Parses a string to find the Rogoto commands and returns an array of the commands.

exception parser.RogotoParserException(message)¶

Exception object when there is invalid items in the code
